companies.name: MentorMate Bulgaria Ltd.
companies.about: An industry veteran, MentorMate meets complex business challenges with native, hybrid, and custom software development. We scale quickly and manage all stages of the software life cycle, including ideation, architecture, design, development, quality assurance, continuation engineering, data, and project management. We have been developing software solutions since 2001 and have established skills across 30+ development languages and 12 technical practices. Our 700-people-strong software development team works closely with our clients to build effective and robust experiences, including client-server and cloud solutions, mobile and desktop applications, modules and libraries, cross-browser web-based solutions, digital experience platforms, data architecture, and data management. Along with our headquarters in Minneapolis, Minnesota, we have an office in Gothenburg, Sweden, and five development offices in Bulgaria — in Sofia, Plovdiv, Varna, Veliko Tarnovo, and Ruse. In addition, we offer full-time remote opportunities to those who would like to work for us from any part of the world, as well as options for contractors through the MentorMate Partner Network platform.
companies.career: Key to our success, our uniquely intelligent developers are deeply involved in the entire software development process — from communication and planning to delivery, testing, and continuation engineering. In the creative development environment at MentorMate, our primary focus is on people. It is deeply embedded in our culture that our team members should be provided with creative and challenging work, the latest development technologies, flexibility, daily communication with our colleagues and clients in the U.S., and recognition for their accomplishments. We encourage result-driven software experts to advance their careers by presenting them with the opportunity to develop their technical, soft, and leadership skills and discover the role they find most rewarding. Similarly, our DevCamp initiative trains interns ready to start their careers in software development. Our QA Academy further develops the IT industry in the country by educating the next generation of young talents interested in software testing and our DevTalks lectures aim to share know-how, experience, and inspiration on tech topics with the public. Are you ready to become part of our success story? Apply today!
benefits: Opportunity to relocate to one of our five offices within the country
Career path with regular salary increases
Covered transport expenses + MentorBike to use
Regular team buildings and office parties

companies.name: Accenture Bulgaria EOOD
companies.about: Accenture is a leading global professional services company, providing a broad range of services and solutions in Strategy and Consulting, Interactive, Technology and Operations. Combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries and all business functions underpinned by the world’s largest delivery network, we work at the intersection of business and technology to help clients improve their performance and create sustainable value for their stakeholders.
companies.career: In Accenture Technology, we provide opportunities for quick career growth for motivated enthusiasts – from a junior to a senior position within less than two years, transforming your career and making you a better professional. Our experts possess leading capabilities in digital, cloud and security. They implement innovative projects in e-commerce, finance, insurance, retail and automobile sector. We are expanding our range of technologies and work with Java, JavaScript, Salesforce Commerce Cloud, Salesforce, SAP Hybris, Intershop React Js and Angular. Our newest roles in the company include Android Development, Data Engineers, Oracle DBA.
benefits: Opportunity to relocate to one of our five offices within the country
Supplementary health insurance for employees and family members
Sports card for employees and family members

internships.description: A custom development company, MentorMate is a design and software powerhouse with mature and established practices in Enterprise Web & Mobile Development, Technical Architecture, Human-Centered Design, Cloud & DevOps, Advanced Data Management & Analytics.

internships.title: Senior Angular Developer, (Remote, Burgas)
internships.description: Accenture Bulgaria is now in Burgas! Enjoy working for the leading global professional IT services company in the comfort of your home in one of the most beautiful Bulgarian cities!

internships.description: We help global brands provide a great experience to their customers, build customer loyalty, and grow their business. We were founded on one guiding principle: customer experiences that are simple, inspired, and more human deliver lasting value for everyone. Your role brings that principle to life.

internships.title: Python Developer
internships.description: Strypes is a Dutch company with an extensive background in software development. For 13 years we have built a team of over 400 people in 4 locations (Sofia, Plovdiv, Burgas, Eindhoven). Together we take ownership over application roadmaps for our clients and structure their overall application landscape.

internships.title: Technical Support Engineer
internships.description: The Automic Workload/UC4 Technical Support Engineer is responsible for delivering operational services to outsourcing accounts, covering the team’s portfolio skillset. Primary tasks include planning, coordination, and implementation of changes (Request For Change) and service requests, and/or project tasks. Basic Scheduling work including modification of scheduling objects in technical environments (add, modify, delete etc.) based on instructions (either predefined, or provided by an Application support team, Business, or Technical Owner). The main goals are to minimize the amount of unplanned downtime in the customer's production environment, to achieve a high level of customer satisfaction and to increase the Quality of execution of procedural/non-procedural and standardized tasks. He/she works in close relationship with other teams and is under direct supervision by the team Management.

internships.title: ASP.Net Web Developer
internships.description:
At Cognyte we create mind-blowing security analytics software to speed up investigations and allow customers to detect and respond to real security threats like terror, crime, fraud, cyber threats, crypto crime, and more.

We did a spinoff in early 2021 and are independently traded on Nasdaq. We’re young, develop cutting-edge technology, and we’re going far, fast.

We are looking for a ASP.NET Web Developer to join our Situational Intelligence Solutions (SIS) team. You will be working with our NowForce solution which is focused around first response to emergency events, with management and dispatching capabilities of forces in the field to improve response time to life threatening situations and save lives.
